EmailTemplate.name: 202101_Global_Nav-Sensors_Thermal-Switches_Selena-Automation_Email_Operational.S
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Thermal Switches Follow-up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
My name is Selena and I’m the product line director for Honeywell’s Thermal Switches portfolio. I am humbled and excited that you are considering our sensors for your next project.
To help us best serve you, please take a minute to tell us a little more about your inquiry:
- What is your role? - What is the application? - Is this a new application or a replacement in an existing application? - Is your question technical (product selection / data sheet) or transactional (quote / lead time)?
Thanks for your time.
Selena Schmidt
